text: Marville is a commune in the Meuse department in Grand Est in north-eastern France. Marville An airbase built by NATO hosted fighter squadrons from the RCAF from 1952 to 1967. ==Geography== The village lies on the left bank of the Othain, which forms most of the commune's eastern border. ==See also== * Communes of the Meuse department ==References== Category:Communes of Meuse (department)
title: Marville, Meuse
